World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 25 日，星期日 08:06:34 GMT 120
India's Assam scraps colonial-era Muslim marriage lawIndia's Assam state has scrapped an 89-year-old law that allowed marriage involving underage Muslims, against opposition from leaders of the minority community who called the plan an attempt to polarise voters on religious lines ahead of elections. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 04:31:43 GMT N7UV4V2S25K3ZKWSZDM4VISTA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-assam-scraps-colonial-era-muslim-marriage-law-2024-02-25/Tora Agarwala世界印度
Convenience store stabbing in Japan kills one, injures two, NHK saysOne person has died and two more were injured on Sunday morning in a stabbing incident in a convenience store in Sapporo on Japan's northern island of Hokkaido, NHK broadcaster reported. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 03:58:58 GMT WUNWBHH3VJPNHE2BDAXMGLVY7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/convenience-store-stabbing-japan-kills-one-injures-two-nhk-says-2024-02-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Australia PM pledges 'whatever support' needed as wild fires destroy homesAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese pledged on Sunday to provide whatever support was needed to assist Victoria state in a days-long wildfire emergency that has razed homes after authorities warned extreme heat could fan the blazes this week. Sun, 25 Feb 2024 02:22:43 GMT FJ6JUNE2OBRL7DPIMHB66XSQ6II https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/australian-homes-destroyed-bushfires-extreme-heat-ahead-2024-02-25/Reuters商业环境
UK PM Sunak says West should be bolder about seizing Russian assetsWestern nations should be bolder about confiscating Russian assets which they froze after the country's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022, British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 23:30:46 GMT EXYZMYNQVVLRND2ALSXPNWSPO4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk-pm-sunak-says-west-should-be-bolder-about-seizing- Russian-assets-2024-02-24/Reuters世界
Yemen's Houthis target fuel tanker Torm Thor in Gulf of AdenYemen's Houthis targeted MV Torm Thor, a U.S.-flagged, owned, and operated oil tanker, in the Gulf of Aden, the Iran-aligned group's military spokesman Yahya Sarea said on Sunday, as the militants continue to attack shipping lanes in solidarity with Palestinians in Gaza. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 23:21:58 GMT OGE4QYXWAZM6BPEYTUJSCGWXXE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthis-target-fuel-tankers-storm-thor-gulf-of-aden-2024-02-24/Reuters世界中东地区
Yemen's Houthi Al Masirah TV: US, UK forces carry out a series of strikes in SanaaAl Masirah TV, the main television news outlet run by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthi movement, said on Saturday that U.S. and British forces carried out a series of airstrikes in the capital, Sanaa. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 22:37:17 GMT AVMK22N3R5NCZM6BN3WWTQLIII https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthi-al-masirah-tv-us-uk-forces-carry-out-series-of-strikes-sanaa-2024-02-24/Reuters世界中东地区
France's Macron picks Valerie Hayer to lead his camp in EU elections, La Tribune reportsFrench President Emmanuel Macron has chosen Valerie Hayer, the head of the liberal Renew group at the European Parliament, to lead his camp in June's EU elections, French weekly newspaper La Tribune Dimanche reported on Saturday. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 22:31:51 GMT ULLPGEJ47BLH7GALJHVYMB3ANM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-macron-picks-valerie-hayer-lead-his-camp-eu-elections-the-tribune-reports-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
US, British forces carry out more strikes against Houthis in YemenU.S. and British forces carried out strikes against more than a dozen Houthi targets in Yemen on Saturday, officials said, the latest round of military action against the Iran-linked group that continues to attack shipping in the region. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 22:14:14 GMT GFFMZ4LMUBNWHOB46QPFCWFWMY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-british-forces-carry-out-additional-strikes-against-houthis-in-yemen-2024-02-24/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中东地区
Germany still discussing supplying long-range weapons to Ukraine, foreign minister saysGerman Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock, in Ukraine's Black Sea port of Odesa on Saturday, said Germany was still discussing whether to supply long-range weapons to Ukraine. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 21:31:08 GMT LQK32Q4JQNOFNHCICFRGRDBNVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-still-discussing-supplying-long-range-weapons-ukraine-foreign-minister-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Western leaders in Kyiv, G7 pledge support for Ukraine on war anniversaryHeads of the Group of Seven major democracies on Saturday pledged to stand by war-weary Ukraine, and Western leaders traveled to Kyiv to show solidarity on the second anniversary of Russia's invasion, with no end in the sight to the fighting. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 20:00:45 GMT BM5K4COAGJPZBA2V7BWLG7WS2I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/western-leaders-kyiv-g7-pledge-support-ukraine-war-anniversary-2024-02-24/Olena Harmash, Angelo Amante世界欧洲
Israel signals progress in Gaza truce talks, Palestinians see little movementIsraeli leaders planned to convene on Saturday to hear of possible progress in mediated negotiations on a new Gaza truce to recover hostages held by Hamas, but Palestinians saw little change in polarised positions almost five months into the war. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 18:51:12 GMT QRJUZ3VTE5PMNBF4FFRZDY6KLM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-signals-progress-gaza-truce-talks-palestinians-see-little-movement-2024-02-24/Dan Williams, Nidal Al-Mughrabi世界中东地区
